dialogue.text: And so it all comes to an end once more.
The girls, with one notable maritime exception, have shed their appropriated (And often times {i}inappropriate{/i}) skin in order to return to their normal forms.
And after two full days of seeing them in costumes, it comes as a relief in saying-
Actually, no. I still wish they were in their costumes.
But I’m glad this is all wrapping and that I likely won’t have to deal with this much excitement again for a full year.
Or at least however long it takes for Kumon-mi’s malformed timeline to reach my fourth Halloween. Which could honestly be like, three weeks at this point. But who knows?
Either way, play time is over. Which means it’s time to get serious and pass out results.
And also find out what everyone gets to do with me as the reward this time, which I don’t think has been confirmed as of yet.
Let’s do this.
Somebody’s really raring to go this morning, huh?
There’s no time to be gentle when the lives of ten girls are at stake.
I want to say that no one is taking this contest that seriously but, unfortunately (And rather depressingly) I think you might be right.
Alright! Listen up, everybody! In just a few minutes, we’ll be going over the final results for this year’s Super Mega Ultimate Dorm War (Halloween Version)!
But before we do that, we have one {i}other{/i} batch of votes we need to go over. And, as I’m sure you already know, those votes are for this year’s popularity contest.
So if Chika and Otoha could-
Wait, where’s Otoha? I don’t see her out there.
She didn’t want to come.
Seriously? Is she still mad about last night?
Probably. All I asked was if she was coming or not. We haven’t really {i}talked{/i} yet.
Well, I guess that makes things easier to announce then since voting was a total blowout in Chika’s favor.
Heh. Of course it was.
Yup! As it turns out, not showing up to events or campaigning to get votes doesn’t do much to bolster your chances of victory! So...congratulations, Chika! And great job at...being places!
Thank you, Imani. And thank you to everyone who voted for me. I happily accept both my second consecutive Dorm War victory {i}and{/i} my role as the most popular girl in school.
Did you see the full results? Our class was obviously split, but you blew it out of the water with the rest of the school.
Yeah. And I’m sure that has {i}nothing{/i} to do with the fact that Otoha transferred in late and doesn’t know as many people.
It really comes down to just knowing how to talk to the voters. And if there is anything I’m good at, it’s-
Manipulation? Bribery? Blackmail?
Being {i}social.{/i}
{i}Blech.{/i} Even worse.
Okay! So now that our final contest is all wrapped up...who’s ready to hear the results?!

A small round of applause rings out and attracts a few passersby to stop and observe what’s going on, only to find a crowd of teenagers, a girl in a dolphin suit, and a “foreigner” reading something off of a tablet.
Needless to say, the applause does not hold their attention for long. Which is good because I highly doubt they’d understand what’s happening here anyway.
The winner...
Of this year’s Super Mega Ultimate Dorm War...
Well...it’s all over. The best holiday of the year has finally come to an end.
Memories were made...lives were destroyed...
But most importantly...we got to see Io in a butler outfit.
Was that seriously the best part of the weekend for you? Because that was probably in my bottom ten.
I’m surprised you stuck around long enough to make any sort of ranking. I feel like we barely saw you at the last Dorm War.
Probably because I find everyone but Uta, Sensei, and sometimes Otoha entirely unbearable.
I take it you didn’t vote for me, then?
I would have voted for a literal dog over you.
I’m glad I didn’t have to run against a dog. I might be popular, but I’m not “beat a dog in a popularity contest” popular.
If we do this contest again next year...maybe you should run, Io?
Run {i}away?{/i} Sure. I can do that.
Run in the contest, obviously. Might be good to show people you’re not just a big ole antisocial jerk.
But...But that’s exactly who I am.
Yeah, but you’re also really good at faking stuff when you really want to.
If it’s any consolation, I don’t hate you or anything. But I probably wouldn’t vote for you either because of the whole second floor thing.
Wait, why are you even here? Since when do you hang out with us?
Rin is mad at me and Yumi is MIA. I gravitated toward Uta since she talks a lot.
Oh. Well, can you gravitate away now?
Nah. Not unless Yumi randomly shows up.
I’m Yumi.
Wow. Talk about convenient timing.
Yumi?! What are you doing here?!
Have somethin’ to take care of.
Nodoka, run!
Not that.
What do you have to take care of? Because I’m being kicked out of this group and I don’t want to walk around in circles pretending I’m on the phone.
Just gotta have a quick conversation. Five minutes tops. Then we can go get breakfast or some shit. I don’t know.
Wait, don’t you have school today? The fuck you guys doing just hanging out like this?
Since when does skipping matter to you?
There’s no class today. Imani got the Dorm Wars labeled as a school-wide holiday so everybody can go home and watch the televised version.
You mean to tell me this shit’s actually televised?
Yeah. Crazy, right?
We’ve sure come a long way in just a year.
Aight, well...I guess just keep not fitting in or some shit until I get back. Like I said, won’t take long.
Okay! Good luck with whatever it is you’re doing!
Yeah! And please hurry!
Oh, Yumi. What a surprise.
Yeah, hi. I ain’t here to beat the shit out of anybody.
That’s good.
Do you want to hear who won the-
Nah. Don’t care. Ain’t even really a part of the class anymore.
Just wanted to talk to the douchebag beside you for a few minutes.
I’m assuming I am the douchebag?
Do you see anyone around here douchier than you?
Might I suggest the dolphin to my left?
Fuck off.
Jesus Christ, it speaks?!
I ain’t talkin’ to a fuckin’ dolphin. Just come with me for a minute. It won’t take long.
Imani...there’s not anything left for me to do, right?
Yeah there is. You’ve gotta protect me from the mystery dolphin. I didn’t realize it was {i}intelligent.{/i}
Ain’t got all day.
Sorry. Protect yourself.
Senpai! Be careful! She’s a known assailant!
I think I can take her.
Yeah, you fucking wish.
So...what’s going-
Listen...I'm just gonna cut right to the chase.
Why’d you just let it happen?
You know what I’m talking about.
I don’t have an excuse, Yumi.
Yeah, how the fuck {i}could{/i} you?!

What kind of shit do you think you can just say to make it feel like none of that ever happened?! Because if there’s some sorta miracle cure you think you can pull outta thin air, I’d love to hear it!
Yumi-
I was finally starting to trust you! I thought you were on my side!

All that shit with...helping me get a job! Helping me study! Genuinely fucking apologizing for the shitty things you’ve done to me! Was that all fake?! Some kind of plot to get me undressed?! To corner me?!
Is this just a game to you?! Am I a plaything?!
Nothing about that was or {i}is{/i} a game. I told you back then that I was just as surprised as you.
Then why?...
Why did you just freeze?
You're a fucking {i}adult...{/i}
Why didn’t you stand up to her?
Because I didn’t know {i}how...{/i}
Or maybe some part of me didn’t want to.
I don’t know.
I’m disgusting, Yumi.
You know it. I know it. Everyone knows it. It’s not like I try to keep it a secret.
And I’m not just talking about forcing myself on you either. I’m talking about {i}everything.{/i}
Do you have {i}any{/i} idea how many times I’ve gotten off while thinking about you? Because the number would make you sick.
Why...are you telling me this? That’s not why I-
Because lying to you doesn’t work. And I’m sure you don’t {i}want{/i} me to lie to you either.
I don’t {i}know{/i} why I froze. But I did. And I can’t go back in time and change that, just like I can’t go back in time and change when I kissed you.
Or, I don’t know. Maybe I can. But I don’t {i}want{/i} to because it’s those things that brought us here.
And even if this world is fucked beyond belief and I’m going to repeatedly destroy any hope you’ll ever have in me, I can’t change.
I {i}won’t{/i} change.
But {i}you{/i} will.
If you want to keep staying away from me, that’s fine. I don’t blame you.
You’ve already given me multiple chances to redeem myself and I’ve squandered every single one of them.
You can’t trust me.
You were an idiot for ever {i}thinking{/i} you could trust me after all I’ve done to you.
And the most disheartening part of all of that is I can’t even remember some of it.
Or maybe I can...but I {i}don't.{/i}
Maybe I just {i}choose{/i} not to remember because of the way it makes me feel.
But I’d do it all again in a heartbeat because that’s just who I am.
Never count on me.
Never believe in me.
{s}And run away while you still can.{/s}
But why?...
Why what?
Why are you telling me this {i}now?...{/i}
Uhh...Sensei?
I think we’ve got a bit of a problem...
